reviewText: Has some gems for those wanting hard to find shorts. More for scholars or hard core fans of certain directors. Films tend to be interesting in the sense of how some director broke into the business or began his career, or in the sense of experimental film.

I have been looking for a copy of Tim Burton's College film, "Vincent," for some time. Not only does it appear in this collection, but there are a host of other fantastic shorts as well. I highly recommend this collection to anyone who's interested in seeing some more obscure works from amazing Directors.
